titleStmt.title: The nevv life of Virginea declaring the former successe and present estate of that plantation, being the second part of Noua Britannia. Published by the authoritie of his Maiesties Counsell of Virginea.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Robert, fl. 1586-1626.
Counseil for Virginia (England and Wales)

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for William Welby, dwelling at the signe of the Swan in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: R.I., i.e. Robert Johnson.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Swan in Pauls Churchyard
